title: League Doesn't Open up Login Screen After Launch. HELP!
body: So for the past 2 hours  I have tried to reinstall league completely delete different files in the riots folder from a series of youtube videos and or reddit pages with different solutions to this problem. But all solutions are over a 1 year old. Has Anyone Been having this problem recently and also a solution to it. Thank you.

replies.body:
Manually deleting files or following unofficial guides to cause more issues than solve.   This issue might be more of an accessing game files issue, and not necessarily the game files itself.  

It actually sounds like your OS might be blocking the patcher from being launched or accessing files.  I recommend going over our [Permissions ](https://supportal.riotgames.com:11002/download/attachments/59147106/runbook-icon.png?version=2&modificationDate=1466469536000&api=v2)guide to help this issue fixed up!  Hit me up if you continue to have any problems!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=g4YjGbA1,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-29T17:03:23.763+0000)
>
> Manually deleting files or following unofficial guides to cause more issues than solve.   This issue might be more of an accessing game files issue, and not necessarily the game files itself.  
> 
> It actually sounds like your OS might be blocking the patcher from being launched or accessing files.  I recommend going over our [Permissions ](https://supportal.riotgames.com:11002/download/attachments/59147106/runbook-icon.png?version=2&modificationDate=1466469536000&api=v2)guide to help this issue fixed up!  Hit me up if you continue to have any problems!

Forgot to mention this 2 months ago but thank you this did help. after my Computer updated my firewall was being a super douche and i just didnt notice it. Thanks again for the Help Glad you said something.
